column3: floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object
column4: open an unlocked floor or container
column5: stow or retrieve an item from an open container
column6: or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand can't attack

column2: M ";"1 minute";"(a bit of fleece) You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again. If you create a sound
column3: its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice
column7: or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration
column8: or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair
column10: or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot cube. The image can’t create sound
column13: or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion
column14: because things can pass through it. If a creature uses its action to examine the sound or image
column15: the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is
column16: the illusion becomes faint to the creature."

column4: up to 1 minute";"(tiny tarts and a feather that is waved in the air)    A creature of your choice that you can see within range perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter if this spell affects it. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or fall prone

becoming incapacitated and unable to stand up for the duration. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn’t affected.
At the end of each of its turns
column6: and each time it takes damage

column1: 1;"Dissonant Whispers";"1st level enchantment";"1 action";"60 feet";"V";"Instantaneous";"You whisper a discordant melody that only one creature of your choice within range can hear
column2: wracking it with terrible pain. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save
column3: it takes 3d6 psychic damage and must immediately use its reaction
column5: to move as far as its speed allows away from you. The creature doesn't move into obviously dangerous ground
column6: such as a fire or a pit. On a successful save
column7:
the target takes half as much damage and doesn't have to move away. A deafened creature automatically succeeds on the save.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher
column8: the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st."

column1: 1;"Command";"1st level Enchantment";"1 action";"60 feet";"V";"1 round";" You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead
column2: if it doesn’t understand your language
column3: or if your command is directly harmful to it.  Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so
column4: the DM determines how the target behaves. If the target can’t follow your command
column5: the spell ends.  Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route
column6: ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.  Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.  Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.  Grovel. The target falls prone and then ends its turn.  Halt. The target doesn’t move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft
column7: provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft
column8: it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.  At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher
column9: you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them."
